title:
Comparison of the Hitchin metric and the semi-flat metric in the rank
  two case
abstract:
Let $(E,\theta)$ be a Higgs bundle of rank $2$ and degree $0$ on a compact
Riemann surface $X$ whose spectral curve is smooth. The tangent space of the
moduli space of Higgs bundles at $(E,\theta)$ is equipped with two natural
metrics called the Hitchin metric and the semi-flat metric. It is known that
the difference between two metrics along the curve $(E,t\theta)$ $(t\geq 1)$
decays in an exponential way. In this paper, we shall study how the exponential
rate is improved.
